episodes.Title: Minimum Viable Product
episodes.Plot: Richard is a computer programmer. He has to choose between a $10 million deal with Gavin Belson and a $200,000 deal with Peter Gregory, in exchange for his cooperation to make the idea of a super compressing algorithm change the world.
episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
episodes.Writer: Mike Judge, John Altschuler, Dave Krinsky, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by)

episodes.Title: The Cap Table
episodes.Plot: Richard hires Jared to design a business plan. Big Head is asked to work for Gavin Belson, where he discovers that Hooli has stolen the Pied Piper algorithm and calls it Nucleus. Meanwhile Richard struggles to get his money from Gregory.
episodes.Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
episodes.Writer: Carson Mell, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Matteo Borghese (staff writer), Rob Turbovsky (staff writer), Jessica Gao (staff writer), Carson Mell (story editor)
